full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Information: Fire, Safety, and Rescue Equipment

**Notice Number:** WS4094110047-Doc4095717598

**Publication Date:** July 13, 2023

**Closing Date:** August 17, 2023 at 14:00:00 (EDT)

**Deadline for Submissions:** August 17, 2023 at 14:00:00 (EDT)

The Department of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites suppliers and industry stakeholders to participate in a Request for Information (RFI) for the Standing Offer for Fire, Safety, and Rescue Equipment (E60HN-23FSRE).

**Purpose of the RFI:**

The RFI seeks to gather information and feedback from suppliers and industry stakeholders on the procurement requirements for Fire, Safety, and Rescue Equipment. This will enable PSPC to inform the development of the Standing Offer.

**Scope of the Standing Offer:**

The Standing Offer aims to acquire Fire, Safety, and Rescue Equipment, which falls under the following categories:

* Personal safety and protection (46180000)
* Fall protection and rescue equipment (46182300)
* Fire fighting equipment (46191600)

**Procurement Category:** Government of Canada (GD)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding

**Notice Type:** Request for Information

**Procurement Status:** Expiring (due to the closing date of August 17, 2023)

For further information, please visit the Ariba Discovery website:

[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16864018?extsite=MTY4NjQwMThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16864018?extsite=MTY4NjQwMThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

To express your interest in participating in this RFI, please contact:

Phillipe Bisson (SPAC/PSPC)
phillipe.bisson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: This RFI does not constitute a bid solicitation and will not result in the issuance of a Standing Offer. The responses will be used to inform the procurement process.
